GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
regulator: pfuze100: Fix refcount leak in pfuze_parse_regulators_dt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 0be5d9da5743b9825a95baec85a67500b2c1d362, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 3784b6d64dc52ed3fbebad61a85ab9b7a687a167. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: regulator: pfuze100: Fix refcount leak in pfuze_parse_regulators_dt
